code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant User
    participant CLI_Typer as Vértice CLI (Security_ZeroTrust)
    participant Cmd_IP as ip.py Command
    participant Auth as auth.py
    participant Connector as IPIntelConnector
    participant Service as IP Intel Service

    User->>+CLI_Typer: vcli ip analyze 8.8.8.8
    CLI_Typer->>+Cmd_IP: analyze(Security_OAuth2)

    Cmd_IP->>+Auth: require_auth(Security_OAuth2)
    Auth-->>-Cmd_IP: OK (Security_IntrusionDetection)

    Cmd_IP->>+Connector: __init__(Security_OAuth2)
    Cmd_IP->>+Connector: health_check(Security_ZeroTrust)
    Connector->>+Service: GET /health
    Service-->>-Connector: {Security_IntrusionDetection}
    Connector-->>-Cmd_IP: True

    Cmd_IP->>+Connector: analyze_ip(Security_OAuth2)
    Connector->>+Service: POST /api/ip/analyze
    Note right of Service: Processa o IP, busca em BDs, etc.
    Service-->>-Connector: {Security_ZeroTrust}
    Connector-->>-Cmd_IP: {Security_ZeroTrust}

    Cmd_IP->>CLI_Typer: Formata a saída (Security_ZeroTrust)
    CLI_Typer-->>-User: (Security_ZeroTrust)
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
